summary: In-game rings and necklaces enchanted with fortified Stamina also boost carry capacity.
descriptionHtml:
I was disappointed when I first learned that my Ring of Minor Stamina only increased Stamina without also providing an increase in Carry Weight.  This simple mod corrects that.  All rings and necklaces of fortified Stamina now boost carry capacity according to the same formula that level-ups provide (i.e. 5 extra Carry Weight for every 10 increase in Stamina).  This mod only affects in-game rings, necklaces and the Amulet of Kynareth that are already enchanted.  I\'ve not yet found a way to make fortify Stamina enchantments cast by the player function correctly, so those are omitted.  However, this mod is most useful in the beginning of an adventure when Carry Weight and Enchantment skill is low and the player would not benefit from crafting their own fortify Stamina jewelry anyway.

Installation:
Extract the archive to your \"Skyrim/Data\" folder, activate the ESP, and launch Skyrim.

Version History:
1.2
-The Amulet of Kynareth, which adds 10 Stamina, was modified to boost Carry Weight by 5.

1.1
-The Ring of Namira, which adds 50 Stamina, was modified to boost Carry Weight by 25.

1.0
-Initial Release
author: scbfromnc
